scripts.build-exe: npm run build && npm run pkg-build
scripts.pkg-build: pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output ../binaries/server-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe && pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output ../binaries/server-x86_64-apple-darwin && pkg dist/server.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output ../binaries/server-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
